Package com.sweatshop.path.screens

Class GameScreen

java.lang.Object
com.sweatshop.path.screens.AbstractScreen
com.sweatshop.path.screens.GameScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
Direct Known Subclasses:
MultiplayerGameScreen
public class GameScreen extends AbstractScreen
The main game screen where the puzzle gameplay occurs. Handles game logic, user input, and rendering of the puzzle grid.
